name: Funky Track
description:
Funky Track is an endless mobile  game where you have to play your instruments to collect and avoid different types of Quavers.

Each instrument changes the current shoundtrack  when it is played !

Get a high score playing Funky Track and unlock more lanes, more combinations and ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACKS! 

Play the SAXOPHONE to Jump!
Play the KEYTAR to avoid as a coolest Funky and play the ELECTRIC GUITAR to destroy those damn black semicorcheas in front of you with a rocking kick!
